TitleEnglish: Smoking Behind the Supermarket With You
SummaryEnglish: Meet Sasaki, an overworked, middle-aged office worker. His days are marked only by the passing of more unrewarding corporate drudgery. Smoking helps take the edge off, but other than that, the only bright spot of his day is when he goes to the nearby supermarket and sees Yamada's smiling face. So, one evening after yet another exhausting day, he heads to the supermarket to find he missed Yamada's shift. Dejected, he decides to go find a smoking area but discovers there isn’t one to be found. Just as he’s about to leave, a girl in a biker jacket named Tayama asks him to join her at a secret smoking area!
Aliases: Sūpā no Ura de Yani Sū Futari
Suupaa no Ura de Yani Suu Futari
Supaa no Ura de Yani Suu Futari
Super no Ura de Yani Sū Futari
Super no Ura de Yani Suu Futari
Super no Ura de Yani Sū Hanashi
Super no Ura de Yani Suu Hanashi
A Story About Smoking at the Back of the Supermarket
Behind the Supermarket, Smoking With You.
